title: Unable to comment on Boards due to level
body: Not sure how I am supposed to level my boards account. I tried commenting on a discussion and it said my account needed to be level 6 or higher. If this level is separate from my actual league account, which is level 30 with 200+ games played, how do I go about leveling my boards account?

replies.body: This discussion post seems to have caused a sync between your Boards and Summoner Profiles. You should encounter no further issues posting!
